title: Flex Team Looking (Silver 4)

embed.description: Niege / Platinum 4 0LP / 271W 269L Win Ratio 50% / Blitzcrank - 181W 147L Win Ratio 55%, Thresh - 68W 81L Win Ratio 46%, Hecarim - 4W 4L Win Ratio 50%, Morgana - 3W 4L Win Ratio 43%, Jarvan IV - 3W 4L Win Ratio 43%

body:
Hey all, as season closes very soon. I'm wanting to get to Gold / Plat in Flex, being already Plat in Solo Queue.

Ideally looking for a 5 man squad to play with, so we can get there asap.

Hit me up! 

IGN Niege

Thanks!

replies.body:
DragonAgeGOD3 added and message for top laner
main account banned so dw about level
